list.name: HIT-THE-LIGHTS
list.description: Lumi ignites her morning stars on the ground, producing flames which damage nearby enemies for x seconds. Damage per second: x
list.descriptionHtml: Lumi ignites her morning stars on the ground, producing flames which damage nearby enemies for x seconds. Damage per second: x

list.name: GRIM-AND-FROSTBITTEN
list.description: Lumi creates freezing winds around her morning stars on the ground, creating a slippery surface for x secs.
list.descriptionHtml: Lumi creates freezing winds around her morning stars on the ground, creating a slippery surface for x secs.
